landing.title: Vote for the Cardano Summit Awards
landing.description: 10 categories, 10 winners awarded for their work and exceptional contributions within the Cardano ecosystem. Vote for the shortlisted nominees and watch the winners announced live at the Cardano Summit 2023 Gala Awards Dinner.

requirements.title: Requirements to submit votes using the Cardano Ballot

sms.title: Ability to receive an SMS verification message.
sms.hint: A one-time SMS code to securely and quickly verify a Cardano Ballot account.

discord.title: A supported Cardano wallet and/or browser extension.
discord.hint: You dont need to have any funds in your Wallet to use Cardano Ballot. View a list of supported Wallets.

createVerify.title: Creating and verifying a Cardano Ballot account

1.title: Click on “Connect Wallet” and choose a supported wallet from the list.
1.hint: By default, only Flint wallet (Desktop/Mobile) as well as already installed supported wallets will be shown.

2.title: Verify the wallet using CIP8 message signing through SMS or Discord.
2.hint: Capacity to choose between SMS and Discord verification to account for different user preferences.

submitVote.title: How to submit a vote on the Cardano Ballot

steps.1: Go to the Cardano Summit Awards categories.
steps.2: To see shortlisted nominees, click “View Nominees” on each category tile.
steps.3: Review the nominees of a specific category and select the one you want to vote for.
steps.5: To proceed with the voting, select “Sign with Wallet”.
steps.6: Click on “Submit Vote” to complete the process.
